GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Responds with an article object by article Id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Responds with an array of comments for given article_id requested with the most recent first
